name: Plate From Outline and Thickness
description: Creates a Plate from a Polyline and Thickness.

inputParameters.name: outline
inputParameters.description: Referenced polyline, Guid of polyline in the active Rhino document.

inputParameters.name: vector
inputParameters.description: Determines direction of the plate extrusion

inputParameters.name: openings
inputParameters.description: List of openings in the plate.

inputParameters.name: updateRefObj
inputParameters.description: (optional) If True, the attributes in the referenced object will be updated/overwritten with the new values given here.
